login.accountNotActivated: Your account has not been activated yet. Please check your email and click the activation link.

activation.tokenExpired: Activation token has expired or is invalid
activation.success: Account activated successfully. You can now log in.
activation.resendGeneric: If the email exists and is not activated, you will receive a new link.
activation.rateLimitExceeded: You must wait {{minutes}} minutes before requesting another activation email

user.registered: User registered. Please check your email to activate your account.

validation.maxLength: {field} must not have more than {max} characters
validation.isPhoneNumber: {field} must be a valid phone number
validation.passwordStrength: Password must contain uppercase, lowercase, numbers and special characters

verification.subject: Verify your account - {{appName}}
verification.title: Verify Your Account
verification.message: Thank you for registering. Use the following code to verify your account:
verification.expiresIn: This code will expire in {{expiresIn}} minutes
verification.securityNote: If you did not request this code, please ignore this email.

activation.subject: Activate Your Account - {{appName}}
activation.title: Activate Your Account
activation.message: Thank you for signing up. Click the button below to activate your account:
activation.expiresIn: This link will expire in {{expiresIn}} hours
activation.alternativeText: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
activation.securityNote: If you didn't create this account, you can safely ignore this email.

welcome.subject: Welcome to {{appName}}, {{firstName}}!
welcome.title: Welcome!
welcome.message: Your account has been verified successfully and is now active.
welcome.accountReady: Your account is ready to use!
welcome.closing: If you have any questions, feel free to contact us.

passwordReset.subject: Password Recovery - {{appName}}
passwordReset.title: Password Recovery
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset your account password.
passwordReset.instruction: Click the button below to create a new password:
passwordReset.expiresIn: This link will expire in {{expiresIn}} minutes
passwordReset.alternativeText: If the button does not work, copy and paste the following link into your browser:
passwordReset.securityNote: If you did not request this reset, please ignore this email. Your account will remain secure.

passwordChanged.subject: Your password has been updated - {{appName}}
passwordChanged.title: Password Updated
passwordChanged.message: We confirm that the password for your account has been successfully changed.
passwordChanged.loginMessage: You can now log in with your new password.
passwordChanged.securityMessage: If you did not make this change, your account may be compromised. Please contact our support team immediately at:
passwordChanged.tip1: Use unique passwords for every service
passwordChanged.tip3: Never share your password with anyone
